Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Acromion \A*cro"mi*on\, n. [Gr. ?; 'a`kros extreme + ? shoulder: cf. F. acromion.] (Anat.) The outer extremity of the shoulder blade. [1913 Webster]
acromion n : the outermost point of the spine of the shoulder blade [syn: {acromial process}] [also: {acromia} (pl)]
